ayah: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-ra til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: Alif Laam Ra These (are the) Verses (of) the Book [the] clear

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu qur'anan arabiyyan la'allakum ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Indeed, We We have sent it down (as) a Quran in Arabic (as) a Quran in Arabic so that you may understand

ayah: نَحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡقَصَصِ بِمَآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ
ayah_translit: nahnu naqussu alayka ahsana al-qasasi bima awhayna ilayka hadha al-qur'ana wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina al-ghafilina
ayah_english: We relate to you the best of the narrations in what We have revealed to you (of) this the Quran although you were before it before it surely among the unaware

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ يُوسُفُ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّي رَأَيۡتُ أَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوۡكَبٗا وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ رَأَيۡتُهُمۡ لِي سَٰجِدِينَ
ayah_translit: idh qala yusufu li-abihi yaabati inni ra-aytu ahada ashara kawkaban wal-shamsa wal-qamara ra-aytuhum li sajidina
ayah_english: When said Yusuf to his father O my father Indeed, I I saw eleven eleven star(s) and the sun and the moon I saw them to me prostrating

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ يُوسُفُ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّي رَأَيۡتُ أَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوۡكَبٗا وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ رَأَيۡتُهُمۡ لِي سَٰجِدِينَ

ayah: قَالَ يَٰبُنَيَّ لَا تَقۡصُصۡ رُءۡيَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ إِخۡوَتِكَ فَيَكِيدُواْ لَكَ كَيۡدًاۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: qala yabunayya la taqsus ru'yaka ala ikh'watika fayakidu laka kaydan inna al-shaytana lil'insani aduwwun mubinun
ayah_english: He said O my son! (Do) not relate your vision to your brothers lest they plan against you a plot Indeed the Shaitaan (is) to man an enemy open

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَجۡتَبِيكَ رَبُّكَ وَيُعَلِّمُكَ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِ وَيُتِمُّ نِعۡمَتَهُۥ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَ كَمَآ أَتَمَّهَا عَلَىٰٓ أَبَوَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika yajtabika rabbuka wayu'allimuka min tawili al-ahadithi wayutimmu ni'matahu alayka wa'ala ali ya'quba kama atammaha ala abawayka min qablu ib'rahima wa-is'haqa inna rabbaka alimun hakimun
ayah_english: And thus will choose you your Lord and will teach you of (the) interpretation (of) the narratives and complete His Favor on you and on (the) family (of) Yaqub as He completed it on your two forefathers before before Ibrahim and Ishaq Indeed your Lord (is) All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَجۡتَبِيكَ رَبُّكَ وَيُعَلِّمُكَ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِ وَيُتِمُّ نِعۡمَتَهُۥ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَ كَمَآ أَتَمَّهَا عَلَىٰٓ أَبَوَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah_translit: wakadhalika yajtabika rabbuka wayu'allimuka min tawili al-ahadithi wayutimmu ni'matahu alayka wa'ala ali ya'quba kama atammaha ala abawayka min qablu ib'rahima wa-is'haqa inna rabbaka alimun hakimun
ayah_english: And thus will choose you your Lord and will teach you of (the) interpretation (of) the narratives and complete His Favor on you and on (the) family (of) Yaqub as He completed it on your two forefathers before before Ibrahim and Ishaq Indeed your Lord (is) All-Knower All-Wise

ayah_translit: wakadhalika yajtabika rabbuka wayu'allimuka min tawili al-ahadithi wayutimmu ni'matahu alayka wa'ala ali ya'quba kama atammaha ala abawayka min qablu ib'rahima wa-is'haqa inna rabbaka alimun hakimun
ayah_english: And thus will choose you your Lord and will teach you of (the) interpretation (of) the narratives and complete His Favor on you and on (the) family (of) Yaqub as He completed it on your two forefathers before before Ibrahim and Ishaq Indeed your Lord (is) All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: ۞لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ
ayah_translit: laqad kana fi yusufa wa-ikh'watihi ayatun lilssailina
ayah_english: Certainly were in Yusuf and his brothers signs for those who ask

ayah: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِينَا مِنَّا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّ أَبَانَا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_translit: idh qalu layusufu wa-akhuhu ahabbu ila abina minna wanahnu us'batun inna abana lafi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: When they said Surely Yusuf and his brother (are) more beloved to our father than we while we (are) a group Indeed our father (is) surely in an error clear

ayah: ٱقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ أَوِ ٱطۡرَحُوهُ أَرۡضٗا يَخۡلُ لَكُمۡ وَجۡهُ أَبِيكُمۡ وَتَكُونُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا صَٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: uq'tulu yusufa awi it'rahuhu ardan yakhlu lakum wajhu abikum watakunu min ba'dihi qawman salihina
ayah_english: Kill Yusuf or cast him (to) a land so will be free for you (the) face (of) your father and you will be after that after that a people righteous

ayah: ٱقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ أَوِ ٱطۡرَحُوهُ أَرۡضٗا يَخۡلُ لَكُمۡ وَجۡهُ أَبِيكُمۡ وَتَكُونُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا صَٰلِحِينَ

ayah_english: Kill Yusuf or cast him (to) a land so will be free for you (the) face (of) your father and you will be after that after that a people righteous

ayah: ٱقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ أَوِ ٱطۡرَحُوهُ أَرۡضٗا يَخۡلُ لَكُمۡ وَجۡهُ أَبِيكُمۡ وَتَكُونُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا صَٰلِحِينَ

ayah: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ لَا تَقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ وَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّ يَلۡتَقِطۡهُ بَعۡضُ ٱلسَّيَّارَةِ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
ayah_translit: qala qailun min'hum la taqtulu yusufa wa-alquhu fi ghayabati al-jubi yaltaqit'hu ba'du al-sayarati in kuntum fa'ilina
ayah_english: Said a speaker among them (Do) not kill Yusuf but throw him in the bottom (of) the well will pick him some [the] caravan if you are doing

ayah: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ لَا تَقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ وَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّ يَلۡتَقِطۡهُ بَعۡضُ ٱلسَّيَّارَةِ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مَا لَكَ لَا تَأۡمَ۬نَّا عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَنَٰصِحُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu yaabana ma laka la tamanna ala yusufa wa-inna lahu lanasihuna
ayah_english: They said O our father! Why (do) you not trust us with Yusuf while indeed we (are) for him surely well-wishers

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مَا لَكَ لَا تَأۡمَ۬نَّا عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَنَٰصِحُونَ

ayah: أَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعَنَا غَدٗا يَرۡتَعۡ وَيَلۡعَبۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
ayah_translit: arsil'hu ma'ana ghadan yarta' wayal'ab wa-inna lahu lahafizuna
ayah_english: Send him with us tomorrow (to) enjoy and play And indeed, we for him (will) surely (be) guardians

ayah: أَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعَنَا غَدٗا يَرۡتَعۡ وَيَلۡعَبۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

ayah: أَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعَنَا غَدٗا يَرۡتَعۡ وَيَلۡعَبۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

ayah: قَالَ إِنِّي لَيَحۡزُنُنِيٓ أَن تَذۡهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَخَافُ أَن يَأۡكُلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَأَنتُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala inni layahzununi an tadhhabu bihi wa-akhafu an yakulahu al-dhi'bu wa-antum anhu ghafiluna
ayah_english: He said Indeed, [I] it surely saddens me that you should take him you should take him and I fear that would eat him a wolf while you of him (are) unaware

ayah: قَالُواْ لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanahnu us'batun inna idhan lakhasiruna
ayah_english: They said If eats him the wolf while we (are) a group indeed we then surely (would be) losers

ayah: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَن يَجۡعَلُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُم بِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma dhahabu bihi wa-ajma'u an yaj'aluhu fi ghayabati al-jubi wa-awhayna ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hadha wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: So when they took him they took him and agreed that they put him in (the) bottom (of) the well But We inspired to him Surely, you will inform them about this affair about this affair while they (do) not perceive

ayah: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَن يَجۡعَلُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُم بِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَن يَجۡعَلُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُم بِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

ayah: وَجَآءُوٓ أَبَاهُمۡ عِشَآءٗ يَبۡكُونَ
ayah_translit: wajau abahum ishaan yabkuna
ayah_english: And they came (to) their father early at night weeping

ayah: وَجَآءُوٓ أَبَاهُمۡ عِشَآءٗ يَبۡكُونَ
ayah_translit: wajau abahum ishaan yabkuna
ayah_english: And they came (to) their father early at night weeping

ayah_translit: wajau abahum ishaan yabkuna
ayah_english: And they came (to) their father early at night weeping

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُؤۡمِنٖ لَّنَا وَلَوۡ كُنَّا صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yaabana inna dhahabna nastabiqu watarakna yusufa inda mata'ina fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wama anta bimu'minin lana walaw kunna sadiqina
ayah_english: They said O our father! Indeed we [we] went racing each other and we left Yusuf with our possessions and ate him the wolf But not you (will) believe us even if we are truthful

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُؤۡمِنٖ لَّنَا وَلَوۡ كُنَّا صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yaabana inna dhahabna nastabiqu watarakna yusufa inda mata'ina fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wama anta bimu'minin lana walaw kunna sadiqina
ayah_english: They said O our father! Indeed we [we] went racing each other and we left Yusuf with our possessions and ate him the wolf But not you (will) believe us even if we are truthful

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُؤۡمِنٖ لَّنَا وَلَوۡ كُنَّا صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yaabana inna dhahabna nastabiqu watarakna yusufa inda mata'ina fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wama anta bimu'minin lana walaw kunna sadiqina
ayah_english: They said O our father! Indeed we [we] went racing each other and we left Yusuf with our possessions and ate him the wolf But not you (will) believe us even if we are truthful

ayah: وَجَآءُو عَلَىٰ قَمِيصِهِۦ بِدَمٖ كَذِبٖۚ قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٞۖ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: wajau ala qamisihi bidamin kadhibin qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jamilun wal-lahu al-mus'ta'anu ala ma tasifuna
ayah_english: And they brought upon his shirt with false blood with false blood He said Nay has enticed you has enticed you your souls (to) a matter so patience (is) beautiful And Allah (is) the One sought for help against what you describe

ayah: وَجَآءُو عَلَىٰ قَمِيصِهِۦ بِدَمٖ كَذِبٖۚ قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٞۖ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

ayah: وَجَآءَتۡ سَيَّارَةٞ فَأَرۡسَلُواْ وَارِدَهُمۡ فَأَدۡلَىٰ دَلۡوَهُۥۖ قَالَ يَٰبُشۡرَىٰ هَٰذَا غُلَٰمٞۚ وَأَسَرُّوهُ بِضَٰعَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wajaat sayyaratun fa-arsalu waridahum fa-adla dalwahu qala yabush'ra hadha ghulamun wa-asarruhu bida'atan wal-lahu alimun bima ya'maluna
ayah_english: And there came a caravan and they sent their water drawer then he let down his bucket He said O good news! This (is) a boy And they hid him (as) a merchandise And Allah (is) All- Knower of what they do

ayah: وَجَآءَتۡ سَيَّارَةٞ فَأَرۡسَلُواْ وَارِدَهُمۡ فَأَدۡلَىٰ دَلۡوَهُۥۖ قَالَ يَٰبُشۡرَىٰ هَٰذَا غُلَٰمٞۚ وَأَسَرُّوهُ بِضَٰعَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّـٰهِدِينَ
ayah_translit: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darahima ma'dudatin wakanu fihi mina al-zahidina
ayah_english: And they sold him for a price very low dirhams few and they were about him of those keen to give up

ayah: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّـٰهِدِينَ

ayah_translit: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darahima ma'dudatin wakanu fihi mina al-zahidina

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي ٱشۡتَرَىٰهُ مِن مِّصۡرَ لِٱمۡرَأَتِهِۦٓ أَكۡرِمِي مَثۡوَىٰهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِنُعَلِّمَهُۥ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَالِبٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhi ish'tarahu min mis'ra li-im'ra-atihi akrimi mathwahu asa an yanfa'ana aw nattakhidhahu waladan wakadhalika makkanna liyusufa fi al-ardi walinu'allimahu min tawili al-ahadithi wal-lahu ghalibun ala amrihi walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And said the one who bought him of Egypt to his wife Make comfortable his stay Perhaps that (he) will benefit us or we will take him (as) a son And thus We established Yusuf in the land that We might teach him (the) interpretation of (the) interpretation of the events And Allah (is) Predominant over His affairs but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي ٱشۡتَرَىٰهُ مِن مِّصۡرَ لِٱمۡرَأَتِهِۦٓ أَكۡرِمِي مَثۡوَىٰهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِنُعَلِّمَهُۥ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَالِبٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي ٱشۡتَرَىٰهُ مِن مِّصۡرَ لِٱمۡرَأَتِهِۦٓ أَكۡرِمِي مَثۡوَىٰهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِنُعَلِّمَهُۥ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَالِبٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: And said the one who bought him of Egypt to his wife Make comfortable his stay Perhaps that (he) will benefit us or we will take him (as) a son And thus We established Yusuf in the land that We might teach him (the) interpretation of (the) interpretation of the events And Allah (is) Predominant over His affairs but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي ٱشۡتَرَىٰهُ مِن مِّصۡرَ لِٱمۡرَأَتِهِۦٓ أَكۡرِمِي مَثۡوَىٰهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِنُعَلِّمَهُۥ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَالِبٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And when he reached his maturity We gave him wisdom and knowledge And thus We reward the good-doers

ayah_translit: walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And when he reached his maturity We gave him wisdom and knowledge And thus We reward the good-doers

ayah: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And when he reached his maturity We gave him wisdom and knowledge And thus We reward the good-doers

ayah_translit: walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And when he reached his maturity We gave him wisdom and knowledge And thus We reward the good-doers

ayah: وَرَٰوَدَتۡهُ ٱلَّتِي هُوَ فِي بَيۡتِهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَغَلَّقَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبَ وَقَالَتۡ هَيۡتَ لَكَۚ قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَحۡسَنَ مَثۡوَايَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: warawadathu allati huwa fi baytiha an nafsihi waghallaqati al-abwaba waqalat hayta laka qala ma'adha al-lahi innahu rabbi ahsana mathwaya innahu la yuf'lihu al-zalimuna
ayah_english: And sought to seduce him she who he (was) in her house from his self And she closed the doors and she said Come on you He said I seek refuge in Allah I seek refuge in Allah Indeed, he (is) my lord (who has) made good my stay Indeed not will succeed the wrongdoers

ayah: وَرَٰوَدَتۡهُ ٱلَّتِي هُوَ فِي بَيۡتِهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَغَلَّقَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبَ وَقَالَتۡ هَيۡتَ لَكَۚ قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَحۡسَنَ مَثۡوَايَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

ayah: وَرَٰوَدَتۡهُ ٱلَّتِي هُوَ فِي بَيۡتِهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَغَلَّقَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبَ وَقَالَتۡ هَيۡتَ لَكَۚ قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَحۡسَنَ مَثۡوَايَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ هَمَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ وَهَمَّ بِهَا لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّءَا بُرۡهَٰنَ رَبِّهِۦۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءَۚ إِنَّهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad hammat bihi wahamma biha lawla an raa bur'hana rabbihi kadhalika linasrifa anhu al-sua wal-fahshaa innahu min ibadina al-mukh'lasina
ayah_english: And certainly she did desire him and he would have desired her if not that he saw the proof (of) his Lord Thus that We might avert from him the evil and the immorality Indeed he (was) of Our slaves the sincere

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ هَمَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ وَهَمَّ بِهَا لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّءَا بُرۡهَٰنَ رَبِّهِۦۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءَۚ إِنَّهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ هَمَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ وَهَمَّ بِهَا لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّءَا بُرۡهَٰنَ رَبِّهِۦۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءَۚ إِنَّهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad hammat bihi wahamma biha lawla an raa bur'hana rabbihi kadhalika linasrifa anhu al-sua wal-fahshaa innahu min ibadina al-mukh'lasina
ayah_english: And certainly she did desire him and he would have desired her if not that he saw the proof (of) his Lord Thus that We might avert from him the evil and the immorality Indeed he (was) of Our slaves the sincere

ayah: وَٱسۡتَبَقَا ٱلۡبَابَ وَقَدَّتۡ قَمِيصَهُۥ مِن دُبُرٖ وَأَلۡفَيَا سَيِّدَهَا لَدَا ٱلۡبَابِۚ قَالَتۡ مَا جَزَآءُ مَنۡ أَرَادَ بِأَهۡلِكَ سُوٓءًا إِلَّآ أَن يُسۡجَنَ أَوۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-is'tabaqa al-baba waqaddat qamisahu min duburin wa-alfaya sayyidaha lada al-babi qalat ma jazau man arada bi-ahlika suan illa an yus'jana aw adhabun alimun
ayah_english: And they both raced (to) the door and she tore his shirt from the back and they both found her husband at the door She said What (is) the recompense (of one) who intended for your wife evil except that he be imprisoned or a punishment painful

ayah: وَٱسۡتَبَقَا ٱلۡبَابَ وَقَدَّتۡ قَمِيصَهُۥ مِن دُبُرٖ وَأَلۡفَيَا سَيِّدَهَا لَدَا ٱلۡبَابِۚ قَالَتۡ مَا جَزَآءُ مَنۡ أَرَادَ بِأَهۡلِكَ سُوٓءًا إِلَّآ أَن يُسۡجَنَ أَوۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

ayah_translit: wa-is'tabaqa al-baba waqaddat qamisahu min duburin wa-alfaya sayyidaha lada al-babi qalat ma jazau man arada bi-ahlika suan illa an yus'jana aw adhabun alimun
ayah_english: And they both raced (to) the door and she tore his shirt from the back and they both found her husband at the door She said What (is) the recompense (of one) who intended for your wife evil except that he be imprisoned or a punishment painful

ayah: قَالَ هِيَ رَٰوَدَتۡنِي عَن نَّفۡسِيۚ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ إِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن قُبُلٖ فَصَدَقَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: qala hiya rawadatni an nafsi washahida shahidun min ahliha in kana qamisuhu qudda min qubulin fasadaqat wahuwa mina al-kadhibina
ayah_english: He said She sought to seduce me about myself And testified a witness of her family If [is] his shirt (is) torn from the front then she has spoken the truth and he (is) of the liars

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ مِن كَيۡدِكُنَّۖ إِنَّ كَيۡدَكُنَّ عَظِيمٞ

ayah_english: So when he saw his shirt torn from (the) back he said Indeed it (is) of your plot Indeed your plot (is) great

ayah: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِي لِذَنۢبِكِۖ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَاطِـِٔينَ
ayah_translit: yusufu a'rid an hadha wa-is'taghfiri lidhanbiki innaki kunti mina al-khatiina
ayah_english: Yusuf turn away from this And ask forgiveness for your sin Indeed you are of the sinful

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ نِسۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ تُرَٰوِدُ فَتَىٰهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۖ قَدۡ شَغَفَهَا حُبًّاۖ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰهَا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: waqala nis'watun fi al-madinati im'ra-atu al-'azizi turawidu fataha an nafsihi qad shaghafaha hubban inna lanaraha fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: And said women in the city The wife of Aziz (is) seeking to seduce her slave boy about himself indeed he has impassioned her (with) love Indeed we [we] surely see her in an error clear

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ نِسۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ تُرَٰوِدُ فَتَىٰهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۖ قَدۡ شَغَفَهَا حُبًّاۖ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰهَا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: waqala nis'watun fi al-madinati im'ra-atu al-'azizi turawidu fataha an nafsihi qad shaghafaha hubban inna lanaraha fi dalalin mubinin

ayah: فَلَمَّا سَمِعَتۡ بِمَكۡرِهِنَّ أَرۡسَلَتۡ إِلَيۡهِنَّ وَأَعۡتَدَتۡ لَهُنَّ مُتَّكَـٔٗا وَءَاتَتۡ كُلَّ وَٰحِدَةٖ مِّنۡهُنَّ سِكِّينٗا وَقَالَتِ ٱخۡرُجۡ عَلَيۡهِنَّۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَيۡنَهُۥٓ أَكۡبَرۡنَهُۥ وَقَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّ وَقُلۡنَ حَٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا هَٰذَا بَشَرًا إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا مَلَكٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: falamma sami'at bimakrihinna arsalat ilayhinna wa-a'tadat lahunna muttaka-an waatat kulla wahidatin min'hunna sikkinan waqalati ukh'ruj alayhinna falamma ra-aynahu akbarnahu waqatta'na aydiyahunna waqul'na hasha lillahi ma hadha basharan in hadha illa malakun karimun
ayah_english: So when she heard of their scheming she sent for them and she prepared for them a banquet and she gave each one of them a knife and she said Come out before them Then when they saw him they greatly admired him and cut their hands they said Forbid Allah not (is) this a man not (is) this but an angel noble

ayah: فَلَمَّا سَمِعَتۡ بِمَكۡرِهِنَّ أَرۡسَلَتۡ إِلَيۡهِنَّ وَأَعۡتَدَتۡ لَهُنَّ مُتَّكَـٔٗا وَءَاتَتۡ كُلَّ وَٰحِدَةٖ مِّنۡهُنَّ سِكِّينٗا وَقَالَتِ ٱخۡرُجۡ عَلَيۡهِنَّۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَيۡنَهُۥٓ أَكۡبَرۡنَهُۥ وَقَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّ وَقُلۡنَ حَٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا هَٰذَا بَشَرًا إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا مَلَكٞ كَرِيمٞ

ayah: فَلَمَّا سَمِعَتۡ بِمَكۡرِهِنَّ أَرۡسَلَتۡ إِلَيۡهِنَّ وَأَعۡتَدَتۡ لَهُنَّ مُتَّكَـٔٗا وَءَاتَتۡ كُلَّ وَٰحِدَةٖ مِّنۡهُنَّ سِكِّينٗا وَقَالَتِ ٱخۡرُجۡ عَلَيۡهِنَّۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَيۡنَهُۥٓ أَكۡبَرۡنَهُۥ وَقَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّ وَقُلۡنَ حَٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا هَٰذَا بَشَرًا إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا مَلَكٞ كَرِيمٞ

ayah: قَالَتۡ فَذَٰلِكُنَّ ٱلَّذِي لُمۡتُنَّنِي فِيهِۖ وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدتُّهُۥ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ فَٱسۡتَعۡصَمَۖ وَلَئِن لَّمۡ يَفۡعَلۡ مَآ ءَامُرُهُۥ لَيُسۡجَنَنَّ وَلَيَكُونٗا مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰغِرِينَ
ayah_translit: qalat fadhalikunna alladhi lum'tunnani fihi walaqad rawadttuhu an nafsihi fa-is'ta'sama wala-in lam yaf 'al ma amuruhu layus'jananna walayakunan mina al-saghirina
ayah_english: She said That (is) the one you blamed me about him And certainly I sought to seduce him [from] [himself] but he saved himself and if not he does what I order him surely he will be imprisoned and certainly will be of those who are disgraced

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱلسِّجۡنُ أَحَبُّ إِلَيَّ مِمَّا يَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَيۡهِۖ وَإِلَّا تَصۡرِفۡ عَنِّي كَيۡدَهُنَّ أَصۡبُ إِلَيۡهِنَّ وَأَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi al-sij'nu ahabbu ilayya mimma yad'unani ilayhi wa-illa tasrif anni kaydahunna asbu ilayhinna wa-akun mina al-jahilina
ayah_english: He said My Lord the prison (is) dearer to me than what they invite me to it And unless You turn away from me their plot I might incline towards them and [I] be of the ignorant

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنۡهُ كَيۡدَهُنَّۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: fa-is'tajaba lahu rabbuhu fasarafa anhu kaydahunna innahu huwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: So responded to him his Lord and turned away from him their plot Indeed [He] He (is) All-Hearer All-Knower

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنۡهُ كَيۡدَهُنَّۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
ayah_translit: thumma bada lahum min ba'di ma ra-awu al-ayati layasjununnahu hatta hinin
ayah_english: Then (it) appeared to them after after [what] they had seen the signs surely they should imprison him until a time

ayah: وَدَخَلَ مَعَهُ ٱلسِّجۡنَ فَتَيَانِۖ قَالَ أَحَدُهُمَآ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَعۡصِرُ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡأٓخَرُ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَحۡمِلُ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِي خُبۡزٗا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِنۡهُۖ نَبِّئۡنَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wadakhala ma'ahu al-sij'na fatayani qala ahaduhuma inni arani a'siru khamran waqala al-akharu inni arani ahmilu fawqa rasi khub'zan takulu al-tayru min'hu nabbi'na bitawilihi inna naraka mina al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And entered with him (in) the prison two young men Said one of them Indeed I [I] see myself pressing wine And said the other Indeed I [I] see myself [I am] carrying over my head bread (were) eating the birds from it Inform us of its interpretation indeed we [we] see you of the good-doers

ayah: وَدَخَلَ مَعَهُ ٱلسِّجۡنَ فَتَيَانِۖ قَالَ أَحَدُهُمَآ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَعۡصِرُ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡأٓخَرُ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَحۡمِلُ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِي خُبۡزٗا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِنۡهُۖ نَبِّئۡنَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wadakhala ma'ahu al-sij'na fatayani qala ahaduhuma inni arani a'siru khamran waqala al-akharu inni arani ahmilu fawqa rasi khub'zan takulu al-tayru min'hu nabbi'na bitawilihi inna naraka mina al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And entered with him (in) the prison two young men Said one of them Indeed I [I] see myself pressing wine And said the other Indeed I [I] see myself [I am] carrying over my head bread (were) eating the birds from it Inform us of its interpretation indeed we [we] see you of the good-doers

ayah: وَدَخَلَ مَعَهُ ٱلسِّجۡنَ فَتَيَانِۖ قَالَ أَحَدُهُمَآ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَعۡصِرُ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡأٓخَرُ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَحۡمِلُ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِي خُبۡزٗا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِنۡهُۖ نَبِّئۡنَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wadakhala ma'ahu al-sij'na fatayani qala ahaduhuma inni arani a'siru khamran waqala al-akharu inni arani ahmilu fawqa rasi khub'zan takulu al-tayru min'hu nabbi'na bitawilihi inna naraka mina al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And entered with him (in) the prison two young men Said one of them Indeed I [I] see myself pressing wine And said the other Indeed I [I] see myself [I am] carrying over my head bread (were) eating the birds from it Inform us of its interpretation indeed we [we] see you of the good-doers

ayah: قَالَ لَا يَأۡتِيكُمَا طَعَامٞ تُرۡزَقَانِهِۦٓ إِلَّا نَبَّأۡتُكُمَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمَاۚ ذَٰلِكُمَا مِمَّا عَلَّمَنِي رَبِّيٓۚ إِنِّي تَرَكۡتُ مِلَّةَ قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: qala la yatikuma ta'amun tur'zaqanihi illa nabbatukuma bitawilihi qabla an yatiyakuma dhalikuma mimma allamani rabbi inni taraktu millata qawmin la yu'minuna bil-lahi wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
ayah_english: He said Not (will) come to both of you food you are provided with but I will inform both of you of its interpretation before [that] [it] comes to both of you That (is) of what has taught me my Lord Indeed I [I] abandon (the) religion (of) a people not they believe in Allah and they in the Hereafter [they] (are) disbelievers

ayah: قَالَ لَا يَأۡتِيكُمَا طَعَامٞ تُرۡزَقَانِهِۦٓ إِلَّا نَبَّأۡتُكُمَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمَاۚ ذَٰلِكُمَا مِمَّا عَلَّمَنِي رَبِّيٓۚ إِنِّي تَرَكۡتُ مِلَّةَ قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: وَٱتَّبَعۡتُ مِلَّةَ ءَابَآءِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۚ مَا كَانَ لَنَآ أَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡنَا وَعَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ittaba'tu millata abai ib'rahima wa-is'haqa waya'quba ma kana lana an nush'rika bil-lahi min shayin dhalika min fadli al-lahi alayna wa'ala al-nasi walakinna akthara al-nasi la yashkuruna
ayah_english: And I follow (the) religion (of) my forefathers Ibrahim and Ishaq and Yaqub Not was for us that we associate with Allah any thing That (is) from (the) Grace (of) Allah upon us and upon the mankind but most (of) the men (are) not grateful

ayah: وَٱتَّبَعۡتُ مِلَّةَ ءَابَآءِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۚ مَا كَانَ لَنَآ أَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡنَا وَعَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah_english: And I follow (the) religion (of) my forefathers Ibrahim and Ishaq and Yaqub Not was for us that we associate with Allah any thing That (is) from (the) Grace (of) Allah upon us and upon the mankind but most (of) the men (are) not grateful

ayah: وَٱتَّبَعۡتُ مِلَّةَ ءَابَآءِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۚ مَا كَانَ لَنَآ أَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡنَا وَعَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah: وَٱتَّبَعۡتُ مِلَّةَ ءَابَآءِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۚ مَا كَانَ لَنَآ أَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡنَا وَعَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ittaba'tu millata abai ib'rahima wa-is'haqa waya'quba ma kana lana an nush'rika bil-lahi min shayin dhalika min fadli al-lahi alayna wa'ala al-nasi walakinna akthara al-nasi la yashkuruna
ayah_english: And I follow (the) religion (of) my forefathers Ibrahim and Ishaq and Yaqub Not was for us that we associate with Allah any thing That (is) from (the) Grace (of) Allah upon us and upon the mankind but most (of) the men (are) not grateful

ayah: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
ayah_translit: yasahibayi al-sij'ni a-arbabun mutafarriquna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu
ayah_english: O my two companions (of) the prison! Are lords separate better or Allah the One the Irresistible

ayah: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

ayah: مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَسۡمَآءٗ سَمَّيۡتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلۡطَٰنٍۚ إِنِ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ أَمَرَ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِيَّاهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: ma ta'buduna min dunihi illa asmaan sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma anzala al-lahu biha min sul'tanin ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi amara alla ta'budu illa iyyahu dhalika al-dinu al-qayimu walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Not you worship besides Him besides Him but names which you have named them you and your forefathers not (has) sent down Allah for it any authority Not (is) the command but for Allah He has commanded that not you worship but Him Alone That (is) the religion the right but most [the] men (do) not know

ayah_translit: ma ta'buduna min dunihi illa asmaan sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma anzala al-lahu biha min sul'tanin ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi amara alla ta'budu illa iyyahu dhalika al-dinu al-qayimu walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna

ayah: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ أَمَّآ أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسۡقِي رَبَّهُۥ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلۡأٓخَرُ فَيُصۡلَبُ فَتَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِن رَّأۡسِهِۦۚ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ تَسۡتَفۡتِيَانِ
ayah_translit: yasahibayi al-sij'ni amma ahadukuma fayasqi rabbahu khamran wa-amma al-akharu fayus'labu fatakulu al-tayru min rasihi qudiya al-amru alladhi fihi tastaftiyani
ayah_english: O my two companions (of) the prison As for one of you he will give drink (to) his master wine and as for the other he will be crucified and will eat the birds from his head Has been decreed the matter about which about which you both inquire

ayah: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ أَمَّآ أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسۡقِي رَبَّهُۥ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلۡأٓخَرُ فَيُصۡلَبُ فَتَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِن رَّأۡسِهِۦۚ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ تَسۡتَفۡتِيَانِ
ayah_translit: yasahibayi al-sij'ni amma ahadukuma fayasqi rabbahu khamran wa-amma al-akharu fayus'labu fatakulu al-tayru min rasihi qudiya al-amru alladhi fihi tastaftiyani

ayah_english: O my two companions (of) the prison As for one of you he will give drink (to) his master wine and as for the other he will be crucified and will eat the birds from his head Has been decreed the matter about which about which you both inquire

ayah: وَقَالَ لِلَّذِي ظَنَّ أَنَّهُۥ نَاجٖ مِّنۡهُمَا ٱذۡكُرۡنِي عِندَ رَبِّكَ فَأَنسَىٰهُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ ذِكۡرَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلَبِثَ فِي ٱلسِّجۡنِ بِضۡعَ سِنِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala lilladhi zanna annahu najin min'huma udh'kur'ni inda rabbika fa-ansahu al-shaytanu dhik'ra rabbihi falabitha fi al-sij'ni bid'a sinina
ayah_english: And he said to the one whom he thought that he (would be) saved of both of them Mention me to your master But made him forget the Shaitaan (the) mention (to) his master so he remained in the prison several years

ayah: وَقَالَ لِلَّذِي ظَنَّ أَنَّهُۥ نَاجٖ مِّنۡهُمَا ٱذۡكُرۡنِي عِندَ رَبِّكَ فَأَنسَىٰهُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ ذِكۡرَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلَبِثَ فِي ٱلسِّجۡنِ بِضۡعَ سِنِينَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰ سَبۡعَ بَقَرَٰتٖ سِمَانٖ يَأۡكُلُهُنَّ سَبۡعٌ عِجَافٞ وَسَبۡعَ سُنۢبُلَٰتٍ خُضۡرٖ وَأُخَرَ يَابِسَٰتٖۖ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَأُ أَفۡتُونِي فِي رُءۡيَٰيَ إِن كُنتُمۡ لِلرُّءۡيَا تَعۡبُرُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala al-maliku inni ara sab'a baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sab'un ijafun wasab'a sunbulatin khud'rin wa-ukhara yabisatin yaayyuha al-mala-u aftuni fi ru'yaya in kuntum lilrru'ya ta'buruna
ayah_english: And said the king Indeed I [I] have seen seven cows fat eating them seven lean ones and seven ears (of corn) green and other dry O chiefs! Explain to me about my vision if you can of visions interpret

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰ سَبۡعَ بَقَرَٰتٖ سِمَانٖ يَأۡكُلُهُنَّ سَبۡعٌ عِجَافٞ وَسَبۡعَ سُنۢبُلَٰتٍ خُضۡرٖ وَأُخَرَ يَابِسَٰتٖۖ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَأُ أَفۡتُونِي فِي رُءۡيَٰيَ إِن كُنتُمۡ لِلرُّءۡيَا تَعۡبُرُونَ

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَضۡغَٰثُ أَحۡلَٰمٖۖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحۡلَٰمِ بِعَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu adghathu ahlamin wama nahnu bitawili al-ahlami bi'alimina
ayah_english: They said Confused dreams and not we (are) in the interpretation (of) the dreams learned

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي نَجَا مِنۡهُمَا وَٱدَّكَرَ بَعۡدَ أُمَّةٍ أَنَا۠ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ فَأَرۡسِلُونِ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhi naja min'huma wa-iddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi-ukum bitawilihi fa-arsiluni
ayah_english: But said the one who was saved of the two and remembered after a period I [I] will inform you of its interpretation so send me forth

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي نَجَا مِنۡهُمَا وَٱدَّكَرَ بَعۡدَ أُمَّةٍ أَنَا۠ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ فَأَرۡسِلُونِ

ayah: يُوسُفُ أَيُّهَا ٱلصِّدِّيقُ أَفۡتِنَا فِي سَبۡعِ بَقَرَٰتٖ سِمَانٖ يَأۡكُلُهُنَّ سَبۡعٌ عِجَافٞ وَسَبۡعِ سُنۢبُلَٰتٍ خُضۡرٖ وَأُخَرَ يَابِسَٰتٖ لَّعَلِّيٓ أَرۡجِعُ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: yusufu ayyuha al-sidiqu aftina fi sab'i baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sab'un ijafun wasab'i sunbulatin khud'rin wa-ukhara yabisatin la'alli arji'u ila al-nasi la'allahum ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Yusuf O the truthful one! Explain to us about (the) seven cows fat eating them seven lean ones and seven ears (of corn) green and other dry that I may return to the people so that they may know

ayah_english: Yusuf O the truthful one! Explain to us about (the) seven cows fat eating them seven lean ones and seven ears (of corn) green and other dry that I may return to the people so that they may know

ayah: يُوسُفُ أَيُّهَا ٱلصِّدِّيقُ أَفۡتِنَا فِي سَبۡعِ بَقَرَٰتٖ سِمَانٖ يَأۡكُلُهُنَّ سَبۡعٌ عِجَافٞ وَسَبۡعِ سُنۢبُلَٰتٍ خُضۡرٖ وَأُخَرَ يَابِسَٰتٖ لَّعَلِّيٓ أَرۡجِعُ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: Yusuf O the truthful one! Explain to us about (the) seven cows fat eating them seven lean ones and seven ears (of corn) green and other dry that I may return to the people so that they may know

ayah: قَالَ تَزۡرَعُونَ سَبۡعَ سِنِينَ دَأَبٗا فَمَا حَصَدتُّمۡ فَذَرُوهُ فِي سُنۢبُلِهِۦٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala tazra'una sab'a sinina da-aban fama hasadttum fadharuhu fi sunbulihi illa qalilan mimma takuluna
ayah_english: He said You will sow (for) seven years as usual and that which you reap so leave it in its ears except a little from which you (will) eat

ayah: قَالَ تَزۡرَعُونَ سَبۡعَ سِنِينَ دَأَبٗا فَمَا حَصَدتُّمۡ فَذَرُوهُ فِي سُنۢبُلِهِۦٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala tazra'una sab'a sinina da-aban fama hasadttum fadharuhu fi sunbulihi illa qalilan mimma takuluna
ayah_english: He said You will sow (for) seven years as usual and that which you reap so leave it in its ears except a little from which you (will) eat

ayah: قَالَ تَزۡرَعُونَ سَبۡعَ سِنِينَ دَأَبٗا فَمَا حَصَدتُّمۡ فَذَرُوهُ فِي سُنۢبُلِهِۦٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ

ayah: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ سَبۡعٞ شِدَادٞ يَأۡكُلۡنَ مَا قَدَّمۡتُمۡ لَهُنَّ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّا تُحۡصِنُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma yati min ba'di dhalika sab'un shidadun yakul'na ma qaddamtum lahunna illa qalilan mimma tuh'sinuna
ayah_english: Then will come after after that seven hard (years) (which will) consume what you advanced for them except a little of what you (will) store

ayah: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma yati min ba'di dhalika amun fihi yughathu al-nasu wafihi ya'siruna
ayah_english: Then will come after after that a year in it will be given abundant rain the people and in it they will press

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ ٱلرَّسُولُ قَالَ ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسۡـَٔلۡهُ مَا بَالُ ٱلنِّسۡوَةِ ٱلَّـٰتِي قَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِكَيۡدِهِنَّ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: waqala al-maliku i'tuni bihi falamma jaahu al-rasulu qala ir'ji' ila rabbika fasalhu ma balu al-nis'wati allati qatta'na aydiyahunna inna rabbi bikaydihinna alimun
ayah_english: And said the king Bring him to me Bring him to me But when came to him the messenger he said Return to your lord and ask him what (is the) case (of) the women who cut their hands Indeed my Lord of their plot (is) All-Knower

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ ٱلرَّسُولُ قَالَ ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسۡـَٔلۡهُ مَا بَالُ ٱلنِّسۡوَةِ ٱلَّـٰتِي قَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِكَيۡدِهِنَّ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: waqala al-maliku i'tuni bihi falamma jaahu al-rasulu qala ir'ji' ila rabbika fasalhu ma balu al-nis'wati allati qatta'na aydiyahunna inna rabbi bikaydihinna alimun
ayah_english: And said the king Bring him to me Bring him to me But when came to him the messenger he said Return to your lord and ask him what (is the) case (of) the women who cut their hands Indeed my Lord of their plot (is) All-Knower

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ ٱلرَّسُولُ قَالَ ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسۡـَٔلۡهُ مَا بَالُ ٱلنِّسۡوَةِ ٱلَّـٰتِي قَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِكَيۡدِهِنَّ عَلِيمٞ

ayah_english: And said the king Bring him to me Bring him to me But when came to him the messenger he said Return to your lord and ask him what (is the) case (of) the women who cut their hands Indeed my Lord of their plot (is) All-Knower

ayah: قَالَ مَا خَطۡبُكُنَّ إِذۡ رَٰوَدتُّنَّ يُوسُفَ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ قُلۡنَ حَٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا عَلِمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِن سُوٓءٖۚ قَالَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡـَٰٔنَ حَصۡحَصَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَنَا۠ رَٰوَدتُّهُۥ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qala ma khatbukunna idh rawadttunna yusufa an nafsihi qul'na hasha lillahi ma alim'na alayhi min suin qalati im'ra-atu al-'azizi al-ana hashasa al-haqu ana rawadttuhu an nafsihi wa-innahu lamina al-sadiqina
ayah_english: He said What (was) your affair when you sought to seduce Yusuf from himself They said Allah forbid Allah forbid Not we know about him any evil Said (the) wife (of) Aziz Now (is) manifest the truth I sought to seduce him from himself and indeed, he (is) surely of the truthful

ayah: قَالَ مَا خَطۡبُكُنَّ إِذۡ رَٰوَدتُّنَّ يُوسُفَ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ قُلۡنَ حَٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا عَلِمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِن سُوٓءٖۚ قَالَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡـَٰٔنَ حَصۡحَصَ ٱلۡحَقُّ أَنَا۠ رَٰوَدتُّهُۥ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ
ayah_translit: dhalika liya'lama anni lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha la yahdi kayda al-khainina
ayah_english: That he may know that I not [I] betray him in secret and that Allah (does) not guide (the) plan (of) the betrayers

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ
ayah_translit: dhalika liya'lama anni lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha la yahdi kayda al-khainina
ayah_english: That he may know that I not [I] betray him in secret and that Allah (does) not guide (the) plan (of) the betrayers

ayah: ۞وَمَآ أُبَرِّئُ نَفۡسِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلنَّفۡسَ لَأَمَّارَةُۢ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ إِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّيٓۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wama ubarri-u nafsi inna al-nafsa la-ammaratun bil-sui illa ma rahima rabbi inna rabbi ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: And not I absolve myself Indeed the soul (is) a certain enjoiner of evil unless [that] bestows Mercy my Lord Indeed my Lord (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦٓ أَسۡتَخۡلِصۡهُ لِنَفۡسِيۖ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَدَيۡنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٞ
ayah_translit: waqala al-maliku i'tuni bihi astakhlis'hu linafsi falamma kallamahu qala innaka al-yawma ladayna makinun aminun
ayah_english: And said the king Bring him to me Bring him to me I will select him for myself Then when he spoke to him he said Indeed, you (are) today with us firmly established (and) trusted

ayah: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qala ij'alni ala khazaini al-ardi inni hafizun alimun
ayah_english: He said Appoint me over (the) treasuries (of) the land Indeed I (will be) a guardian knowing

ayah: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ يَشَآءُۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحۡمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika makkanna liyusufa fi al-ardi yatabawwa-u min'ha haythu yashau nusibu birahmatina man nashau wala nudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And thus We established [to] Yusuf in the land to settle therein where ever he willed We bestow Our Mercy (on) whom We will And not We let go waste (the) reward (of) the good-doers

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ يَشَآءُۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحۡمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah: وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-ajru al-akhirati khayrun lilladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
ayah_english: And surely (the) reward (of) the Hereafter (is) better for those who believe and are God conscious

ayah: وَجَآءَ إِخۡوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَعَرَفَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wajaa ikh'watu yusufa fadakhalu alayhi fa'arafahum wahum lahu munkiruna
ayah_english: And came (the) brothers (of) Yusuf and they entered upon him and he recognized them but they knew him not knew him not

ayah: وَجَآءَ إِخۡوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَعَرَفَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wajaa ikh'watu yusufa fadakhalu alayhi fa'arafahum wahum lahu munkiruna

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمۡ قَالَ ٱئۡتُونِي بِأَخٖ لَّكُم مِّنۡ أَبِيكُمۡۚ أَلَا تَرَوۡنَ أَنِّيٓ أُوفِي ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَأَنَا۠ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma jahhazahum bijahazihim qala i'tuni bi-akhin lakum min abikum ala tarawna anni ufi al-kayla wa-ana khayru al-munzilina
ayah_english: And when he had furnished them with their supplies he said Bring to me a brother of yours from your father Do not you see that I [I] give full [the] measure and that I am (the) best (of) the hosts

ayah: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ
ayah_translit: fa-in lam tatuni bihi fala kayla lakum indi wala taqrabuni
ayah_english: But if not you bring him to me you bring him to me then (there will be) no measure for you from me and not you will come near me

ayah: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu sanurawidu anhu abahu wa-inna lafa'iluna
ayah_english: They said We will try to get permission for him (from) his father and indeed we surely will do

ayah: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu sanurawidu anhu abahu wa-inna lafa'iluna

ayah: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ لِفِتۡيَٰنِهِ ٱجۡعَلُواْ بِضَٰعَتَهُمۡ فِي رِحَالِهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَعۡرِفُونَهَآ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala lifit'yanihi ij'alu bida'atahum fi rihalihim la'allahum ya'rifunaha idha inqalabu ila ahlihim la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And he said to his servants Put their merchandise in their saddlebags so that they may recognize it when they go back to their people so that they may return

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma raja'u ila abihim qalu yaabana muni'a minna al-kaylu fa-arsil ma'ana akhana naktal wa-inna lahu lahafizuna
ayah_english: So when they returned to their father they said O our father! Has been denied to us the measure so send with us our brother (that) we will get measure And indeed we for him (will) surely (be) guardians

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

ayah: قَالَ هَلۡ ءَامَنُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا كَمَآ أَمِنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَخِيهِ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ حَٰفِظٗاۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qala hal amanukum alayhi illa kama amintukum ala akhihi min qablu fal-lahu khayrun hafizan wahuwa arhamu al-rahimina
ayah_english: He said Should I entrust you with him except as I entrusted you with his brother before before But Allah (is) the best Guardian and He (is the) Most Merciful (of) the merciful

ayah: وَلَمَّا فَتَحُواْ مَتَٰعَهُمۡ وَجَدُواْ بِضَٰعَتَهُمۡ رُدَّتۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مَا نَبۡغِيۖ هَٰذِهِۦ بِضَٰعَتُنَا رُدَّتۡ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَنَمِيرُ أَهۡلَنَا وَنَحۡفَظُ أَخَانَا وَنَزۡدَادُ كَيۡلَ بَعِيرٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ كَيۡلٞ يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: walamma fatahu mata'ahum wajadu bida'atahum ruddat ilayhim qalu yaabana ma nabghi hadhihi bida'atuna ruddat ilayna wanamiru ahlana wanahfazu akhana wanazdadu kayla ba'irin dhalika kaylun yasirun
ayah_english: And when they opened their baggage they found their merchandise returned to them They said O our father! What (could) we desire This (is) our merchandise returned to us And we will get provision (for) our family and we will protect our brother and get an increase measure (of) a camel's (load) That (is) a measurement easy

ayah: وَلَمَّا فَتَحُواْ مَتَٰعَهُمۡ وَجَدُواْ بِضَٰعَتَهُمۡ رُدَّتۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مَا نَبۡغِيۖ هَٰذِهِۦ بِضَٰعَتُنَا رُدَّتۡ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَنَمِيرُ أَهۡلَنَا وَنَحۡفَظُ أَخَانَا وَنَزۡدَادُ كَيۡلَ بَعِيرٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ كَيۡلٞ يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: walamma fatahu mata'ahum wajadu bida'atahum ruddat ilayhim qalu yaabana ma nabghi hadhihi bida'atuna ruddat ilayna wanamiru ahlana wanahfazu akhana wanazdadu kayla ba'irin dhalika kaylun yasirun
ayah_english: And when they opened their baggage they found their merchandise returned to them They said O our father! What (could) we desire This (is) our merchandise returned to us And we will get provision (for) our family and we will protect our brother and get an increase measure (of) a camel's (load) That (is) a measurement easy

ayah: قَالَ لَنۡ أُرۡسِلَهُۥ مَعَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ تُؤۡتُونِ مَوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَتَأۡتُنَّنِي بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يُحَاطَ بِكُمۡۖ فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَوۡهُ مَوۡثِقَهُمۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ
ayah_translit: qala lan ur'silahu ma'akum hatta tu'tuni mawthiqan mina al-lahi latatunnani bihi illa an yuhata bikum falamma atawhu mawthiqahum qala al-lahu ala ma naqulu wakilun
ayah_english: He said Never will I send him with you until you give to me a promise by Allah that surely you will bring him to me that surely you will bring him to me unless that you are surrounded you are surrounded And when they had given him their promise he said Allah over what we say (is) a Guardian

ayah: قَالَ لَنۡ أُرۡسِلَهُۥ مَعَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ تُؤۡتُونِ مَوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَتَأۡتُنَّنِي بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يُحَاطَ بِكُمۡۖ فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَوۡهُ مَوۡثِقَهُمۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ

ayah: وَقَالَ يَٰبَنِيَّ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ مِنۢ بَابٖ وَٰحِدٖ وَٱدۡخُلُواْ مِنۡ أَبۡوَٰبٖ مُّتَفَرِّقَةٖۖ وَمَآ أُغۡنِي عَنكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٍۖ إِنِ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُۖ وَعَلَيۡهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala yabaniyya la tadkhulu min babin wahidin wa-ud'khulu min abwabin mutafarriqatin wama ugh'ni ankum mina al-lahi min shayin ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi alayhi tawakkaltu wa'alayhi falyatawakkali al-mutawakiluna
ayah_english: And he said O my sons (Do) not enter from one gate one gate but enter from gates different And not I can avail you against Allah any thing Not (is) the decision except with Allah upon Him I put my trust and upon Him let put (their) trust the ones who put trust

ayah: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَمَرَهُمۡ أَبُوهُم مَّا كَانَ يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا حَاجَةٗ فِي نَفۡسِ يَعۡقُوبَ قَضَىٰهَاۚ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذُو عِلۡمٖ لِّمَا عَلَّمۡنَٰهُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: walamma dakhalu min haythu amarahum abuhum ma kana yugh'ni anhum mina al-lahi min shayin illa hajatan fi nafsi ya'quba qadaha wa-innahu ladhu il'min lima allamnahu walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And when they entered from where ordered them their father not it avail(ed) them against Allah any thing but (it was) a need of (Yaqub's) soul Yaqub's (soul) which he carried out And indeed, he (was) a possessor (of) knowledge because We had taught him but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَمَرَهُمۡ أَبُوهُم مَّا كَانَ يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا حَاجَةٗ فِي نَفۡسِ يَعۡقُوبَ قَضَىٰهَاۚ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذُو عِلۡمٖ لِّمَا عَلَّمۡنَٰهُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: And when they entered from where ordered them their father not it avail(ed) them against Allah any thing but (it was) a need of (Yaqub's) soul Yaqub's (soul) which he carried out And indeed, he (was) a possessor (of) knowledge because We had taught him but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah_english: And when they entered from where ordered them their father not it avail(ed) them against Allah any thing but (it was) a need of (Yaqub's) soul Yaqub's (soul) which he carried out And indeed, he (was) a possessor (of) knowledge because We had taught him but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَخَاهُۖ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ أَخُوكَ فَلَا تَبۡتَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: walamma dakhalu ala yusufa awa ilayhi akhahu qala inni ana akhuka fala tabta-is bima kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: And when they entered upon Yusuf he took to himself his brother He said Indeed I [I] am your brother so (do) not grieve for what they used (to) do

ayah: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَخَاهُۖ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ أَخُوكَ فَلَا تَبۡتَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَخَاهُۖ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ أَخُوكَ فَلَا تَبۡتَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: walamma dakhalu ala yusufa awa ilayhi akhahu qala inni ana akhuka fala tabta-is bima kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: And when they entered upon Yusuf he took to himself his brother He said Indeed I [I] am your brother so (do) not grieve for what they used (to) do

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمۡ جَعَلَ ٱلسِّقَايَةَ فِي رَحۡلِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ أَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ أَيَّتُهَا ٱلۡعِيرُ إِنَّكُمۡ لَسَٰرِقُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jahhazahum bijahazihim ja'ala al-siqayata fi rahli akhihi thumma adhana mu-adhinun ayyatuha al-'iru innakum lasariquna
ayah_english: So when he had furnished them with their supplies he put the drinking cup in the bag (of) his brother Then called out an announcer O you (in) the caravan! Indeed you surely (are) thieves

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمۡ جَعَلَ ٱلسِّقَايَةَ فِي رَحۡلِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ أَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ أَيَّتُهَا ٱلۡعِيرُ إِنَّكُمۡ لَسَٰرِقُونَ

ayah: قَالُواْ وَأَقۡبَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِم مَّاذَا تَفۡقِدُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu wa-aqbalu alayhim madha tafqiduna
ayah_english: They said turning towards them What (is it) you miss

ayah: قَالُواْ نَفۡقِدُ صُوَاعَ ٱلۡمَلِكِ وَلِمَن جَآءَ بِهِۦ حِمۡلُ بَعِيرٖ وَأَنَا۠ بِهِۦ زَعِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qalu nafqidu suwa'a al-maliki waliman jaa bihi him'lu ba'irin wa-ana bihi za'imun
ayah_english: They said We are missing (the) cup (of) the king And for (one) who brings it (is) a load (of) a camel and I for it (is) responsible

ayah: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu tal-lahi laqad alim'tum ma ji'na linuf'sida fi al-ardi wama kunna sariqina
ayah_english: They said By Allah certainly you know not we came that we cause corruption in the land and not we are thieves

ayah: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ

ayah: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَـٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu fama jazauhu in kuntum kadhibina
ayah_english: They said Then what (will be the) recompense (of) it if you are liars

ayah: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَـٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

ayah_translit: qalu fama jazauhu in kuntum kadhibina
ayah_english: They said Then what (will be the) recompense (of) it if you are liars

ayah: قَالُواْ جَزَـٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَـٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu jazauhu man wujida fi rahlihi fahuwa jazauhu kadhalika najzi al-zalimina
ayah_english: They said Its recompense (is that one) who it is found in his bag then he (will be) his recompense Thus (do) we recompense the wrongdoers

ayah: قَالُواْ جَزَـٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَـٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوۡعِيَتِهِمۡ قَبۡلَ وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَخۡرَجَهَا مِن وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كِدۡنَا لِيُوسُفَۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأۡخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِي دِينِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَٰتٖ مَّن نَّشَآءُۗ وَفَوۡقَ كُلِّ ذِي عِلۡمٍ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'ai akhihi thumma is'takhrajaha min wi'ai akhihi kadhalika kid'na liyusufa ma kana liyakhudha akhahu fi dini al-maliki illa an yashaa al-lahu narfa'u darajatin man nashau wafawqa kulli dhi il'min alimun
ayah_english: So he began with their bags before (the) bag (of) his brother then he brought it out from (the) bag (of) his brother Thus (did) We plan for Yusuf He could not He could not take his brother by the law (of) the king except that Allah willed Allah willed We raise (in) degrees whom We will but over every possessor (of) knowledge (is) the All-Knower

ayah: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوۡعِيَتِهِمۡ قَبۡلَ وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَخۡرَجَهَا مِن وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كِدۡنَا لِيُوسُفَۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأۡخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِي دِينِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَٰتٖ مَّن نَّشَآءُۗ وَفَوۡقَ كُلِّ ذِي عِلۡمٍ عَلِيمٞ

ayah: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوۡعِيَتِهِمۡ قَبۡلَ وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَخۡرَجَهَا مِن وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كِدۡنَا لِيُوسُفَۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأۡخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِي دِينِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَٰتٖ مَّن نَّشَآءُۗ وَفَوۡقَ كُلِّ ذِي عِلۡمٍ عَلِيمٞ

ayah: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوۡعِيَتِهِمۡ قَبۡلَ وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَخۡرَجَهَا مِن وِعَآءِ أَخِيهِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كِدۡنَا لِيُوسُفَۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأۡخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِي دِينِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَٰتٖ مَّن نَّشَآءُۗ وَفَوۡقَ كُلِّ ذِي عِلۡمٍ عَلِيمٞ

ayah: ۞قَالُوٓاْ إِن يَسۡرِقۡ فَقَدۡ سَرَقَ أَخٞ لَّهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُۚ فَأَسَرَّهَا يُوسُفُ فِي نَفۡسِهِۦ وَلَمۡ يُبۡدِهَا لَهُمۡۚ قَالَ أَنتُمۡ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗاۖ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu in yasriq faqad saraqa akhun lahu min qablu fa-asarraha yusufu fi nafsihi walam yub'diha lahum qala antum sharrun makanan wal-lahu a'lamu bima tasifuna
ayah_english: They said If he steals then verily stole a brother of his before before But Yusuf kept it secret But Yusuf kept it secret within himself and (did) not reveal it to them He said You (are the) worse (in) position and Allah knows best of what you describe

ayah: ۞قَالُوٓاْ إِن يَسۡرِقۡ فَقَدۡ سَرَقَ أَخٞ لَّهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُۚ فَأَسَرَّهَا يُوسُفُ فِي نَفۡسِهِۦ وَلَمۡ يُبۡدِهَا لَهُمۡۚ قَالَ أَنتُمۡ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗاۖ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَصِفُونَ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ إِنَّ لَهُۥٓ أَبٗا شَيۡخٗا كَبِيرٗا فَخُذۡ أَحَدَنَا مَكَانَهُۥٓۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yaayyuha al-'azizu inna lahu aban shaykhan kabiran fakhudh ahadana makanahu inna naraka mina al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: They said O Aziz! Indeed he has a father old [great] so take one of us (in) his place Indeed we [we] see you of the good-doers

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ إِنَّ لَهُۥٓ أَبٗا شَيۡخٗا كَبِيرٗا فَخُذۡ أَحَدَنَا مَكَانَهُۥٓۖ إِنَّا نَرَىٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala ma'adha al-lahi an nakhudha illa man wajadna mata'ana indahu inna idhan lazalimuna
ayah_english: He said Allah forbid Allah forbid that we take except (one) who we found our possession with him Indeed, we then surely (would be) wrongdoers

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسُواْ مِنۡهُ خَلَصُواْ نَجِيّٗاۖ قَالَ كَبِيرُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ أَبَاكُمۡ قَدۡ أَخَذَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ مَا فَرَّطتُمۡ فِي يُوسُفَۖ فَلَنۡ أَبۡرَحَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ لِيٓ أَبِيٓ أَوۡ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُ لِيۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma is'tayasu min'hu khalasu najiyyan qala kabiruhum alam ta'lamu anna abakum qad akhadha alaykum mawthiqan mina al-lahi wamin qablu ma farrattum fi yusufa falan abraha al-arda hatta yadhana li abi aw yahkuma al-lahu li wahuwa khayru al-hakimina
ayah_english: So when they despaired of him they secluded themselves (in) private consultation Said the eldest among them Do not you know that your father has taken has taken upon you a promise by Allah and before and before that you failed concerning Yusuf So never will I leave the land until permits me my father or Allah decides Allah decides for me and He (is) the Best (of) the judges

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسُواْ مِنۡهُ خَلَصُواْ نَجِيّٗاۖ قَالَ كَبِيرُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ أَبَاكُمۡ قَدۡ أَخَذَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ مَا فَرَّطتُمۡ فِي يُوسُفَۖ فَلَنۡ أَبۡرَحَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ لِيٓ أَبِيٓ أَوۡ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُ لِيۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسُواْ مِنۡهُ خَلَصُواْ نَجِيّٗاۖ قَالَ كَبِيرُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ أَبَاكُمۡ قَدۡ أَخَذَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ مَا فَرَّطتُمۡ فِي يُوسُفَۖ فَلَنۡ أَبۡرَحَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ لِيٓ أَبِيٓ أَوۡ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُ لِيۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسُواْ مِنۡهُ خَلَصُواْ نَجِيّٗاۖ قَالَ كَبِيرُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ أَبَاكُمۡ قَدۡ أَخَذَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ مَا فَرَّطتُمۡ فِي يُوسُفَۖ فَلَنۡ أَبۡرَحَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ لِيٓ أَبِيٓ أَوۡ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُ لِيۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسُواْ مِنۡهُ خَلَصُواْ نَجِيّٗاۖ قَالَ كَبِيرُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ أَبَاكُمۡ قَدۡ أَخَذَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ مَا فَرَّطتُمۡ فِي يُوسُفَۖ فَلَنۡ أَبۡرَحَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ لِيٓ أَبِيٓ أَوۡ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُ لِيۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

ayah: ٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيكُمۡ فَقُولُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّ ٱبۡنَكَ سَرَقَ وَمَا شَهِدۡنَآ إِلَّا بِمَا عَلِمۡنَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِلۡغَيۡبِ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_translit: ir'ji'u ila abikum faqulu yaabana inna ib'naka saraqa wama shahid'na illa bima alim'na wama kunna lil'ghaybi hafizina
ayah_english: Return to your father and say O our father! Indeed your son has stolen and not we testify except of what we knew And not we were of the unseen guardians

ayah: ٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيكُمۡ فَقُولُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّ ٱبۡنَكَ سَرَقَ وَمَا شَهِدۡنَآ إِلَّا بِمَا عَلِمۡنَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِلۡغَيۡبِ حَٰفِظِينَ

ayah: وَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةَ ٱلَّتِي كُنَّا فِيهَا وَٱلۡعِيرَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَقۡبَلۡنَا فِيهَاۖ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
ayah_translit: wasali al-qaryata allati kunna fiha wal-'ira allati aqbalna fiha wa-inna lasadiquna
ayah_english: And ask the town where we were [in it] and the caravan which we returned [in it] And indeed we surely (are) truthful

ayah: وَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةَ ٱلَّتِي كُنَّا فِيهَا وَٱلۡعِيرَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَقۡبَلۡنَا فِيهَاۖ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ

ayah_english: And ask the town where we were [in it] and the caravan which we returned [in it] And indeed we surely (are) truthful

ayah: قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٌۖ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأۡتِيَنِي بِهِمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jamilun asa al-lahu an yatiyani bihim jami'an innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
ayah_english: He said Nay have enticed you your souls something so patience (is) beautiful Perhaps Allah will bring them to me will bring them to me will bring them to me all Indeed, He He (is) the All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٌۖ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأۡتِيَنِي بِهِمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

ayah: وَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَسَفَىٰ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَٱبۡيَضَّتۡ عَيۡنَاهُ مِنَ ٱلۡحُزۡنِ فَهُوَ كَظِيمٞ
ayah_translit: watawalla anhum waqala yaasafa ala yusufa wa-ib'yaddat aynahu mina al-huz'ni fahuwa kazimun
ayah_english: And he turned away from them and said Alas my grief over Yusuf! And became white his eyes from the grief and he (was) a suppressor

ayah: وَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَسَفَىٰ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَٱبۡيَضَّتۡ عَيۡنَاهُ مِنَ ٱلۡحُزۡنِ فَهُوَ كَظِيمٞ

ayah: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَؤُاْ تَذۡكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوۡ تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡهَٰلِكِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yusufa hatta takuna haradan aw takuna mina al-halikina
ayah_english: They said By Allah you will not cease remembering Yusuf until you become fatally ill or become of those who perish

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala innama ashku bathi wahuz'ni ila al-lahi wa-a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
ayah_english: He said Only I complain (of) my suffering and my grief to Allah and I know from Allah what not you know

ayah: يَٰبَنِيَّ ٱذۡهَبُواْ فَتَحَسَّسُواْ مِن يُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَاْيۡـَٔسُواْ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَاْيۡـَٔسُ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: yabaniyya idh'habu fatahassasu min yusufa wa-akhihi wala tay'asu min rawhi al-lahi innahu la yay'asu min rawhi al-lahi illa al-qawmu al-kafiruna
ayah_english: O my sons Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and not despair of (the) Mercy of Allah (the) Mercy of Allah Indeed none despairs of (the) Mercy of Allah (the) Mercy of Allah except the people the disbelievers

ayah: يَٰبَنِيَّ ٱذۡهَبُواْ فَتَحَسَّسُواْ مِن يُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَاْيۡـَٔسُواْ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَاْيۡـَٔسُ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: يَٰبَنِيَّ ٱذۡهَبُواْ فَتَحَسَّسُواْ مِن يُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَاْيۡـَٔسُواْ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَاْيۡـَٔسُ مِن رَّوۡحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَٰعَةٖ مُّزۡجَىٰةٖ فَأَوۡفِ لَنَا ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّقۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma dakhalu alayhi qalu yaayyuha al-'azizu massana wa-ahlana al-duru waji'na bibida'atin muz'jatin fa-awfi lana al-kayla watasaddaq alayna inna al-laha yajzi al-mutasadiqina
ayah_english: So when they entered upon him they said O Aziz O Aziz Has touched us and our family the adversity and we have come with goods (of) little value but pay (in) full to us the measure and be charitable to us Indeed Allah rewards the charitable

ayah: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَٰعَةٖ مُّزۡجَىٰةٖ فَأَوۡفِ لَنَا ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّقۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَٰعَةٖ مُّزۡجَىٰةٖ فَأَوۡفِ لَنَا ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّقۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ

ayah: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala hal alim'tum ma fa'altum biyusufa wa-akhihi idh antum jahiluna
ayah_english: He said Do you know what you did with Yusuf and his brother when you were ignorant

ayah: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala hal alim'tum ma fa'altum biyusufa wa-akhihi idh antum jahiluna
ayah_english: He said Do you know what you did with Yusuf and his brother when you were ignorant

ayah: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala hal alim'tum ma fa'altum biyusufa wa-akhihi idh antum jahiluna
ayah_english: He said Do you know what you did with Yusuf and his brother when you were ignorant

ayah: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala hal alim'tum ma fa'altum biyusufa wa-akhihi idh antum jahiluna
ayah_english: He said Do you know what you did with Yusuf and his brother when you were ignorant

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ يُوسُفُۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ يُوسُفُ وَهَٰذَآ أَخِيۖ قَدۡ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu a-innaka la-anta yusufu qala ana yusufu wahadha akhi qad manna al-lahu alayna innahu man yattaqi wayasbir fa-inna al-laha la yudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: They said Are you indeed [surely you] Yusuf He said I am Yusuf and this (is) my brother Indeed Allah has been gracious Allah has been gracious to us Indeed, he who fears Allah and (is) patient then indeed Allah (does) not let go waste (the) reward (of) the good-doers

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ يُوسُفُۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ يُوسُفُ وَهَٰذَآ أَخِيۖ قَدۡ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ
ayah_translit: qalu tal-lahi laqad atharaka al-lahu alayna wa-in kunna lakhatiina
ayah_english: They said By Allah certainly Allah has preferred you Allah has preferred you over us and indeed we have been sinners

ayah: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qala la tathriba alaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arhamu al-rahimina
ayah_english: He said No blame upon you today Allah will forgive Allah will forgive you and He (is) the Most Merciful (of) those who show mercy

ayah: ٱذۡهَبُواْ بِقَمِيصِي هَٰذَا فَأَلۡقُوهُ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِ أَبِي يَأۡتِ بَصِيرٗا وَأۡتُونِي بِأَهۡلِكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: idh'habu biqamisi hadha fa-alquhu ala wajhi abi yati basiran watuni bi-ahlikum ajma'ina
ayah_english: Go with this shirt of mine with this shirt of mine and cast it over (the) face (of) my father he will regain sight he will regain sight And bring to me your family all together

ayah: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ
ayah_translit: walamma fasalati al-'iru qala abuhum inni la-ajidu riha yusufa lawla an tufanniduni
ayah_english: And when departed the caravan their father said their father said Indeed, I [I] find (the) smell (of) Yusuf if not that you think me weakened in mind

ayah_translit: walamma fasalati al-'iru qala abuhum inni la-ajidu riha yusufa lawla an tufanniduni
ayah_english: And when departed the caravan their father said their father said Indeed, I [I] find (the) smell (of) Yusuf if not that you think me weakened in mind

ayah: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ

ayah: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ
ayah_translit: qalu tal-lahi innaka lafi dalalika al-qadimi
ayah_english: They said By Allah indeed you surely (are) in your error old

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَن جَآءَ ٱلۡبَشِيرُ أَلۡقَىٰهُ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦ فَٱرۡتَدَّ بَصِيرٗاۖ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma an jaa al-bashiru alqahu ala wajhihi fa-ir'tadda basiran qala alam aqul lakum inni a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
ayah_english: Then when [that] arrived the bearer of glad tidings he cast it over his face then returned (his) sight then returned (his) sight He said Did not I say to you indeed, I [I] know from Allah what not you know

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَن جَآءَ ٱلۡبَشِيرُ أَلۡقَىٰهُ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦ فَٱرۡتَدَّ بَصِيرٗاۖ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_translit: falamma an jaa al-bashiru alqahu ala wajhihi fa-ir'tadda basiran qala alam aqul lakum inni a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna

ayah: قَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yaabana is'taghfir lana dhunubana inna kunna khatiina
ayah_english: They said O our father! Ask forgiveness for us (of) our sins Indeed we have been sinners

ayah: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: qala sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbi innahu huwa al-ghafuru al-rahimu
ayah_english: He said Soon I will ask forgiveness for you (from) my Lord Indeed He He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَبَوَيۡهِ وَقَالَ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مِصۡرَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma dakhalu ala yusufa awa ilayhi abawayhi waqala ud'khulu mis'ra in shaa al-lahu aminina
ayah_english: Then when they entered upon Yusuf he took to himself his parents and said Enter Egypt if Allah wills Allah wills safe

ayah: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيۡهِ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ وَخَرُّواْ لَهُۥ سُجَّدٗاۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ هَٰذَا تَأۡوِيلُ رُءۡيَٰيَ مِن قَبۡلُ قَدۡ جَعَلَهَا رَبِّي حَقّٗاۖ وَقَدۡ أَحۡسَنَ بِيٓ إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَنِي مِنَ ٱلسِّجۡنِ وَجَآءَ بِكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡبَدۡوِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن نَّزَغَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَ إِخۡوَتِيٓۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَطِيفٞ لِّمَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: warafa'a abawayhi ala al-'arshi wakharru lahu sujjadan waqala yaabati hadha tawilu ru'yaya min qablu qad ja'alaha rabbi haqqan waqad ahsana bi idh akhrajani mina al-sij'ni wajaa bikum mina al-badwi min ba'di an nazagha al-shaytanu bayni wabayna ikh'wati inna rabbi latifun lima yashau innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And he raised his parents upon the throne and they fell down to him prostrate And he said O my father This (is the) interpretation (of) my dream (of) before (of) before Verily has made it my Lord true And indeed He was good to me when He took me out of the prison and brought you from the bedouin life after after [that] had caused discord the Shaitaan between me and between my brothers Indeed my Lord (is) Most Subtle to what He wills Indeed, He He (is) the All-Knower the All-Wise

ayah: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيۡهِ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ وَخَرُّواْ لَهُۥ سُجَّدٗاۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ هَٰذَا تَأۡوِيلُ رُءۡيَٰيَ مِن قَبۡلُ قَدۡ جَعَلَهَا رَبِّي حَقّٗاۖ وَقَدۡ أَحۡسَنَ بِيٓ إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَنِي مِنَ ٱلسِّجۡنِ وَجَآءَ بِكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡبَدۡوِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن نَّزَغَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَ إِخۡوَتِيٓۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَطِيفٞ لِّمَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: warafa'a abawayhi ala al-'arshi wakharru lahu sujjadan waqala yaabati hadha tawilu ru'yaya min qablu qad ja'alaha rabbi haqqan waqad ahsana bi idh akhrajani mina al-sij'ni wajaa bikum mina al-badwi min ba'di an nazagha al-shaytanu bayni wabayna ikh'wati inna rabbi latifun lima yashau innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And he raised his parents upon the throne and they fell down to him prostrate And he said O my father This (is the) interpretation (of) my dream (of) before (of) before Verily has made it my Lord true And indeed He was good to me when He took me out of the prison and brought you from the bedouin life after after [that] had caused discord the Shaitaan between me and between my brothers Indeed my Lord (is) Most Subtle to what He wills Indeed, He He (is) the All-Knower the All-Wise

ayah: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيۡهِ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ وَخَرُّواْ لَهُۥ سُجَّدٗاۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ هَٰذَا تَأۡوِيلُ رُءۡيَٰيَ مِن قَبۡلُ قَدۡ جَعَلَهَا رَبِّي حَقّٗاۖ وَقَدۡ أَحۡسَنَ بِيٓ إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَنِي مِنَ ٱلسِّجۡنِ وَجَآءَ بِكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡبَدۡوِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن نَّزَغَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَ إِخۡوَتِيٓۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَطِيفٞ لِّمَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: warafa'a abawayhi ala al-'arshi wakharru lahu sujjadan waqala yaabati hadha tawilu ru'yaya min qablu qad ja'alaha rabbi haqqan waqad ahsana bi idh akhrajani mina al-sij'ni wajaa bikum mina al-badwi min ba'di an nazagha al-shaytanu bayni wabayna ikh'wati inna rabbi latifun lima yashau innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu

ayah: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيۡهِ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ وَخَرُّواْ لَهُۥ سُجَّدٗاۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ هَٰذَا تَأۡوِيلُ رُءۡيَٰيَ مِن قَبۡلُ قَدۡ جَعَلَهَا رَبِّي حَقّٗاۖ وَقَدۡ أَحۡسَنَ بِيٓ إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَنِي مِنَ ٱلسِّجۡنِ وَجَآءَ بِكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡبَدۡوِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن نَّزَغَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَ إِخۡوَتِيٓۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَطِيفٞ لِّمَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: warafa'a abawayhi ala al-'arshi wakharru lahu sujjadan waqala yaabati hadha tawilu ru'yaya min qablu qad ja'alaha rabbi haqqan waqad ahsana bi idh akhrajani mina al-sij'ni wajaa bikum mina al-badwi min ba'di an nazagha al-shaytanu bayni wabayna ikh'wati inna rabbi latifun lima yashau innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And he raised his parents upon the throne and they fell down to him prostrate And he said O my father This (is the) interpretation (of) my dream (of) before (of) before Verily has made it my Lord true And indeed He was good to me when He took me out of the prison and brought you from the bedouin life after after [that] had caused discord the Shaitaan between me and between my brothers Indeed my Lord (is) Most Subtle to what He wills Indeed, He He (is) the All-Knower the All-Wise

ayah: ۞رَبِّ قَدۡ ءَاتَيۡتَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَعَلَّمۡتَنِي مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَنتَ وَلِيِّۦ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ تَوَفَّنِي مُسۡلِمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: rabbi qad ataytani mina al-mul'ki wa'allamtani min tawili al-ahadithi fatira al-samawati wal-ardi anta waliyyi fi al-dun'ya wal-akhirati tawaffani mus'liman wa-alhiq'ni bil-salihina
ayah_english: My Lord indeed you have given me of the sovereignty and taught me of the interpretation of the events Creator (of) the heavens and the earth You (are) my Protector in the world and the Hereafter Cause me to die (as) a Muslim and join me with the righteous

ayah: ۞رَبِّ قَدۡ ءَاتَيۡتَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَعَلَّمۡتَنِي مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَنتَ وَلِيِّۦ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ تَوَفَّنِي مُسۡلِمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah: ۞رَبِّ قَدۡ ءَاتَيۡتَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَعَلَّمۡتَنِي مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَنتَ وَلِيِّۦ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ تَوَفَّنِي مُسۡلِمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalika min anbai al-ghaybi nuhihi ilayka wama kunta ladayhim idh ajma'u amrahum wahum yamkuruna
ayah_english: That (is) from the news (of) the unseen which We reveal to you And not you were with them when they put together their plan while they (were) plotting

ayah: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wama aktharu al-nasi walaw harasta bimu'minina
ayah_english: And not most (of) the mankind even though you desire (will be) believers

ayah: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wama tasaluhum alayhi min ajrin in huwa illa dhik'run lil'alamina
ayah_english: And not you ask them for it any reward Not (is) it but a reminder to the worlds

ayah: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wama tasaluhum alayhi min ajrin in huwa illa dhik'run lil'alamina
ayah_english: And not you ask them for it any reward Not (is) it but a reminder to the worlds

ayah: وَكَأَيِّن مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡهَا وَهُمۡ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: waka-ayyin min ayatin fi al-samawati wal-ardi yamurruna alayha wahum anha mu'riduna
ayah_english: And how many of a Sign in the heavens and the earth they pass over it while they (are) from them the ones who turn away

ayah: وَكَأَيِّن مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡهَا وَهُمۡ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: waka-ayyin min ayatin fi al-samawati wal-ardi yamurruna alayha wahum anha mu'riduna
ayah_english: And how many of a Sign in the heavens and the earth they pass over it while they (are) from them the ones who turn away

ayah: وَكَأَيِّن مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡهَا وَهُمۡ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ

ayah: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: wama yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illa wahum mush'rikuna
ayah_english: And not believe most of them in Allah except while they associate partners with Him

ayah: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ
